programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The Ethiopian Mountain world is ruled by two very different queens, but both mothers raising daughters. programme.title: Diary Of A Teen Leopard
programme.desc: Pemba is a Mamma's Boy! At two-years old, he should be independent, but he's still living at home! Like most teenagers, he's impatient and headstrong, which makes him bad at stalking and hunting, so Mom provides all their meals. But when Mom is injured Pemba is forced to grow up fast in order to survive! Can he sever those apron strings and face his fears to launch into adulthood?.

programme.desc: Each species follows a different rhythm of growth, and this applies to the learning process. As the days go by, we will witness each of our characters' progress and missteps. .

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The Ethiopian Mountain world is ruled by two very different queens, but both mothers raising daughters. A gelada monkey rules a tight knit sisterhood, but with her only daughter on the cusp of adulthood she must make great sacrifices for her future. On the plateau above, an Ethiopian wolf also has a daughter, but this mother must be ruthless to protect her own legacy.

programme.title: Diary Of A Teen Leopard
programme.desc: Pemba is a Mamma's Boy! At two-years old, he should be independent, but he's still living at home! Like most teenagers, he's impatient and headstrong, which makes him bad at stalking and hunting, so Mom provides all their meals. But when Mom is injured Pemba is forced to grow up fast in order to survive! Can he sever those apron strings and face his fears to launch into adulthood?.

programme.title: Born In Africa
programme.desc: All newborns must immediately assimilate two fundamental notions: recognizing their mother as individuals of their own species, and learn to master the body they are discovering. .

programme.title: America's Wild Spaces
programme.desc: Canyonlands is the little known jewel of the American national parks. But this rugged terrain is a more than a pretty picture; it is a history book of time. .

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: When you've got it all, why would you give it all up? We expect animals to take the path of least resistance -- choosing the easiest and surest ways to get food, safety and comfort. But animals aren't always so predictable.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: Crows are as smart as dolphins and can talk like parrots. Wolves can hunt for three days straight in a territory the size of Delaware..

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: Frogs may just be the key to human immortality while the cat's purrs may help keep astronauts alive in space..

programme.title: Eye Of The Leopard
programme.desc: National Geographic filmmakers Dereck and Beverly Joubert set out to create a film on leopards but never imagined they would be seduced by a small, eight-day-old cub named Legadema. Eye of the Leopard follows Legadema‚Äôs journey from a playful cub to a skilled huntress. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Wild South Africa
programme.desc: From the savanna to the desert, the heart of South Africa is home to the most successful hunters, extremely odd animals, and the setting for one of the most colorful natural spectacles on the planet! Far from the cape and coasts, and beyond the Drakensberg Mountains, lie vast semideserts and dry savannas - a world apart, fit for clever survivalists only! .

programme.title: Wild Cats of India
programme.desc: India's big cats remain the soul of the Indian terrain - acting as charismatic ambassadors for the protection of their ecosystems. In Episode 1, watch the snow leopard guard his kill from an unrelenting red fox and follow the lives of the last surviving Asiatic lions of Gir. .

programme.title: Eye Of The Leopard

programme.title: Wild South Africa
programme.desc: Sunshine, sandy beaches and palm trees - not only does the Caribbean boast them, so too does South Africa's East Coast. Here you are no longer privy to the rocky coastline of the Cape of Good Hope!

programme.title: The Jungle King
programme.desc: Kipling's The Jungle Book comes alive as a male Bengal tiger journeys through India's rich and sometimes harrowing wild. The tiger traverses his vast territory on a quest to find a suitable mate and maintain his rule. Along the way, he encounters a diverse cast of characters, including an elephant troop, sloth bear and Indian rock python.

programme.title: Wild Cats of India
programme.desc: India's big cats remain the soul of the Indian terrain - acting as charismatic ambassadors for the protection of their ecosystems. In Episode 1, watch the snow leopard guard his kill from an unrelenting red fox and follow the lives of the last surviving Asiatic lions of Gir. .

programme.title: Wild Cats of India
programme.desc: Join wildlife cameraman, Sandesh Kadur, as he journeys across the Indian subcontinent on a quest to unravel the mysteries of the lesser known felines - India's Incredible Small Cats!.

programme.title: India's Wild Leopards
programme.desc: Follow wildlife cameraman Sandesh Kadur into some of India's most challenging & isolated regions on his mission to discover the secretive lives of India's Secret Leopards..

programme.title: Ultimate Enemies
programme.desc: Lions. Wildebeest. Two great, deadly forces of the Serengeti, clashing like thunder in the African night, and exploding into eruptions of battle under the sizzling African sun. .

programme.title: Eye Of The Leopard
programme.desc: National Geographic filmmakers Dereck and Beverly Joubert set out to create a film on leopards but never imagined they would be seduced by a small, eight-day-old cub named Legadema. Eye of the Leopard follows Legadema‚Äôs journey from a playful cub to a skilled huntress. Narrated by Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol races against the clock to save the life of a mother cow. A whirlwind of emergencies keeps Doc out on nonstop farm calls while his team of vets keep the clinic covered. Dr. Nicole is called to check on a beloved reindeer. Dr. Lisa removes a suspicious growth from a sheep dog and Dr. Brenda treats a puppy that is losing weight.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Brenda and Dr. Pol team up on a challenging farm call. The dire situation turns into an emergency for one of their own. Dr. Lisa diagnoses a cat with an uncommon condition, Dr. Brenda is called out for a rare reindeer birth and Dr. Pols strength and ingenuity are tested to help save the life of a new momma cow. .

programme.title: World's Deadliest
programme.desc: Some you see, and some you don't. But they all have eight legs and a bundle of bulging eyeballs. This is a nightmare of the arachnid kind. So best to look in that shoe before you put it on, because whoever said good things come in small packages, wasn't talking about these guys.

programme.title: World's Deadliest
programme.desc: They slither, hiss and strike.. especially when you catch them by the tail. Sometimes, wrangling snakes is more art than science, and the stakes are high. Get ready to go hand to scale and face to fang with some of the world's deadliest cold blooded killers.
